label: Description
value: Horizontal rectangle.  Thirty-seven tiles wide and twenty-one high with opening for door or window nineteen and one-half tiles high and twelve wide.  To left and right of opening, centered canopy above. Left, woman representing Hope, right, a sculputure urn.  Centered above opening, a mascaron.  Arabesque design of foliage.
